minidraw.framework
Interface Factory

public interface Factory

Abstract factory for creating implementations of the central roles used in MiniDraw. Responsibilities: 1) Create, upon request, all services that the editor needs. Author Henrik Bærbak Christensen 2006

Method Summary
 Drawing createDrawing(DrawingEditor editor)
          Create the drawing (Model role of the MVC pattern).
 DrawingView createDrawingView(DrawingEditor editor)
          Create the drawing view (View role of the MVC pattern).
 javax.swing.JTextField createStatusField(DrawingEditor editor)
          Create the text field used for messages.
